sourcesContent:
<template>
	<button class="top-panel__button" />
</template>

<script>
	export default {
		name: 'TopPanelButton',
	};
</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
	.top-panel__button {
		position: relative;
		padding: 0;
		border-radius: 50%;
		border: 2px solid color(white);
		transition: filter 0.3s ease-in-out;
		margin-right: 8px;
		box-shadow: 3px 3px 5px 0 rgba(color(black), 0.35);
		cursor: pointer;

		&:hover,
		&:focus {
			filter: brightness(1.2);
		}

		&:focus {
			outline: none;
		}

		&:first-child {
			margin-right: 30px;
		}

		&::before {
			content: '';
			position: absolute;
			top: 10%;
			left: 20%;
			width: 35%;
			height: 35%;
			border-radius: 50%;
			background-color: color(white);
		}
	}
</style>
